page.title: 11SIMON'S DAY AT HOME
page.content: My name is Simon, I am a{9 year old {boy.}I live in a{bungalow.}I get up at 9 a.m. and I have Crunchy Nut Cornflakes followed by toast and marmalade for my breakfast. I read for an hour then I go and call for my friend John. We{play}adventure games on his computer for about an hour. Then we play cricket or football. My{lunch}is usually salad or sandwiches with milk to drink. After I call for John again and play wars, cricket etc. I have my{dinner}at about{7 p.m.,} usually lamb or pork chops with vegetables, sometimes followed by a pudding. I watch some{television,}I like the programme called 'Robin Hood'. I clean my teeth, say 'goodnight', go to bed, read and go to sleep at {9 p.m.
